column4: i ve got a problem with my freshly installed ubuntu. it just hangs during boot process ... does anyone know why this happens? i guess it has something todo with grub ...
there are 2 harddrives in my computer... i didn't know where to install grub (hd0 or hd1) during installation process ..
i think that has something todo with the problem
presumably (hd0). most BIOSes bott from the first hard drive 1st
my primary hd is the one where is only one large data partition (but no ones with OS's n it). on the second one are just OS's
got it to start ubuntu. but it hangs during boot at [xxx]  usb 1-2.3 : configuration #1 chosen from 1 choice
how long does it hang for?
since 20 mins ... dont think that it will change
